about_the_game:
• A virgin boy has finally got a girlfriend. His best friend will help him to satisfy the girl of his dreams in this exciting rhythmic game!
  • Original artworks.
  • A fun story in a rhythmic game.
  • Many musics.
  • Couch Mode

content_descriptors.notes:
-This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
-The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
• A virgin boy has finally got a girlfriend. His best friend will help him to satisfy the girl of his dreams in this exciting rhythmic game!
  • Original artworks.
  • A fun story in a rhythmic game.
  • Many musics.
  • Couch Mode

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (or equivalent) running at 2.4GHz or greater; AMD Athlon 64 (or equivalent) running at 2.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb or more
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (or equivalent) running at 2.4GHz or greater; AMD Athlon 64 (or equivalent) running at 2.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb or more
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Duo 2.5 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Hentai Girl Beat
